script:
# script "lisp"
# fadein "black" 0.5
# background "sea_drive"
# bgmfile "bgm256" "BgmSeaDate" 0
# body %(unit_a)s
# pos %(unit_a)s 3
# mask %(unit_a)s off
# chara %(unit_a)s
# textflame 0 0
@
マスターはグリダヴォルを誘って
ドライブにやってきた

# textflame 1 1
@グリダヴォル
…………

# voice 6008 "guridavoru_0022"
# face %(unit_a)s "sad"
# textflame 1 1
@グリダヴォル
ふぇ！？

# textflame 1 1
@グリダヴォル
あ、うん…
どうかした？

# select "景色見ないの？" "select_label_01" "車酔いした…？" "select_label_02" "運転興味ある？" "select_label_03"
あ、うん…
どうかした？

# textwindow "close"
# label "select_label_01"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# waitandnext 0.1

# textwindow "close"
# label "select_label_02"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# waitandnext 0.1

# textwindow "close"
# label "select_label_03"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_end"
# waitandnext 2
# fadeout "black" 1.2
